'''''Eternal Thunder''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Inazuma: The Islands of Thunder and Eternity - Series I]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to upgrade the [[Statues of The Seven]] in [[Inazuma]] to their maximum level.

==Trivia==
* Despite being added in [[Version 2.0]], this achievement could not be earned until [[Version 2.2]] at the earliest, as not all [[Electroculi]] were available until then.
